name: Web Archive
summary: A WARC file is a web archive, which contains website content saved for archival purposes. Various web archiving programs, such as GNU Wget, use crawlers to retrieve web content and store it in WARC files. WARC files may include HTML data, stylesheets, scripts, images, and other webpage elements.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
